title: Suggestions for a sophisticated holiday card font
content:
Does anyone have any recommendations for a font(s) to use for a sophisticated and elegant holiday card? The kind of type that would be used by a high end fashion company or fashion pr company on their corporate holiday card. Nothing too cold though. Should have a personal and/or cute touch.

Thanks!!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
So it's a high end fashion company's corporate Christmas card with a personal or cute touch. That's a lot of bases to touch. Maybe start at House Industries:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/holidayfonts/viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151023/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/holidayfonts/viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/holidayfonts/viewfonts")
Good suggestion. Thanks! Still curious to hear others if people have them.
